text: Emile Daems (4 April 1938 â€“ 17 October 2024) was a Belgian professional road racing cyclist. Daems began his professional career in 1959. Daems was born in Genval, Belgium. He took part of the 1961 and 1962 Tour de France. Daems died in Wavre, Belgium on 17 October 2024, at the age of 86. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Belgian cyclists
title: Emile Daems
